AFG vs AUS Predicted XI, T20 World Cup 2.content: Predicted XI: Travis Head, David Warner, Mitchell Marsh (c), Glenn Maxwell, Marcus Stoinis, Tim David, Matthew Wade (wk), Pat Cummins, Mitchell Starc, Adam Zampa, Josh HazlewoodAfghanistan: The Afghans may give a chance to Mohammad Ishaq, who has scored 75 runs from 4 T20Is with a top score of 32 against Ireland.Australia and Afghanistan will be up against each other in a Super 8 match of the T20 World Cup 2024 on Saturday, June 22 (Sunday, June 23) in India at the Arnos Vale Ground in Kingstown, St Vincent.T20 World Cup Coverage | Points Table | T20 World Cup 2024 Schedule | Player StatsRashid Khan picked up 2 wickets against India, one of which was of Virat Kohli, and the spell should give him a lot of confidence.David Warner raced his way to scoring 53 off 35, and he got support from Travis Head and Glenn Maxwell.Australia: Australia are unlikely to change their playing XI after their thumping win over Bangladesh.

Afghanistan players turn chefs in West I.content: The Afghanistan players had to don the chef's hat after the unavailability of halal meat at their team hotel in Barbados, West Indies.However, there was uncertainty around the meat available in the Bridgetown hotel being halal or not.T20 World Cup Coverage | Points Table | T20 World Cup 2024 Schedule | Player Stats"Halal meat is not available in our hotel.The halal meat is available in the Caribbean island, but it is not certain if all the hotels and restaurants have it on their menu.The absence of halal meat, a compulsory component in their dietary  requirements, left them with no choice but to cook themselves or go out and eat.

My goal is the UFC title: Sergei Pavlovi.content: Now, if I know that he has gone ahead and signed the contract, the only thing that I have left is to sign the contract and accept the fight as well, because I'm not going to be the one who turns down fights," said Pavlovich.The Russian joked maybe he should at first but then said it all comes down to his inner feelings going into a fight.The Russian is hoping that Jones doesn't wait for a long time for the reported fight with Stipe Miocic and make others wait.I think that if you're at the top of the division, if you're top of the food chain in the world, if you're in the sport, you should be able to fight anybody, anytime, anywhere.Both men used to train together and it is a rarity that people who know each other fight it out in the UFC.

Rovman Powell credits Roston Chase and S.content: Rovman Powell credited Roston Chase and Shai Hope for a commanding win for West Indies against the USA.On a good surface, he bowled really well," Powell told the broadcasters after West Indies' win against the USA.In the clash of the co-hosts of the T20 World Cup 2024, West Indies emerged victorious by 9 wickets against the USA at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in St Lucia on June 22, Saturday.WI vs USA: Match Report | Highlights"(On Shai Hope) He's been fantastic, he got a chance against Afghanistan but was dropped next game against England in St Lucia because of the combination.West Indies next encounter against South Africa could be a virtual quarter-final.

T20 World Cup Group 2 Semi-final qualifi.content: They need to beat England by a mammoth margin in their last Super 8 match and then hope for South Africa to hammer West Indies.Given the current scenario, South Africa, England and the West Indies are in with a realistic chance of advancing to the semis.West Indies need a win against South Africa to book their berth in the semis.West Indies had a terrible net run rate of -1.West Indies lost to England in their first Super 8 match, but made a stupendous comeback to beat the United States by 9 wickets at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados.

The West Indies spinner registered his best figures in the T20Is and played a crucial role in restricting the USA to 128 runs.Roston Chase described his roller-coaster of a day from almost missing his team bus to winning the match for West Indies.Our is to go and win this World Cup, we need to beat anyone in front of us," Chase told the broadcasters after the match.WI vs USA: Match Report HighlightsA post shared by ICC Hindi (@icchindiofficial)
West Indies gave a reality check to the USA team after they were in dreamland.The hosts West Indies registered a convincing win by 9 wickets against the USA at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in St Lucia on June 22, Saturday.

Andy Murray to undergo back surgery afte.content: Andy Murray, the celebrated British tennis player, is set to undergo a back procedure after an injury compelled him to retire from his second-round match at the Queen's Club Championships.At 37, Murray has suggested that retiring from professional tennis, either at this year's Wimbledon or the Paris Olympics, could mark a fitting end to his illustrious career.Wimbledon, a centrepiece in the tennis calendar, will take place from July 1 to 14.As Wimbledon quickly approaches, Murray faces a time crunch to regain his form and fitness for the prestigious event.The Guardian has revealed that Murray is set to undergo surgery.

Aiden Markram's catch off Harry Brook wa.content: Quinton de Kock hailed Aiden Markram's stunning catch of Harry Brook as a big moment in the game between South Africa and England at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in St Lucia on June 21, Friday.Looked like Harry was well on the way to be doing that then obviously Aidan just took a stunner which was a big moment for us in the context of the game so yeah, I'm not saying that just the time we won it but just small moments," De Kock told the media in the post-match press-conference.South Africa managed a thriller win by 7 runs against England in the Super 8s match as they inch closer towards semi-final qualification.So, you don't really see it when I play in other teams around the world, you've got different captains, I don't see them really practicing that sort of, those catches, but I see him did it and he won us a game well won us a moment in the game today," De Kock added.The South African opener played a match-winning knock of 65 runs from 38 balls against England.
